#summary Serializing JSON objects

= Introduction =

It is sometimes necessary to send complex data structures to the server in an AJAX call. A JSON object can be serialized before it is sent, and unserialized on the server.



= Including the Framework =

Include the vX Ajax function by either referencing the JS file, or by including the tiny snippet of code inline. The code is at http://vxjs.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/lib/stringify.js

== Arguments ==

vS(JSON OBJECT);

  * The object is recursively serialized, and escaped if necessary

== Examples ==

Basic stuff.
{{{
vS({hello: "world!", recurse: {awesome: "true"}})
//{hello:'world!',recurse:{awesome:'true'}}
}}}

JSON Post Example Function
{{{
function json_post_stringified(url, data, cbk){
  vX(url, cbk?cbk:function(){}, vU({json: vS(data)}));
}

json_post_stringified("ajax.php", {hello: "world!", recurse: {awesome: "true"}})
}}}
